# symbol-node-health-icon

The `<symbol-node-health-icon></symbol-node-health-icon>` component is a Symbol component that provides **a network node health status icon**.

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                 | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | ---------- | --------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `nodeUrl` | `node-url` | The node url (REST gateway) | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event     | Description           | Type                            |
| --------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `fetched` | Emits the node health | `CustomEvent<NodeHealthStatus>` |
